name: Laura-Silvia Diosan
content: Laura Dioșan | Home About me March, 2017 became professor within the Computer Science Department, “Babeş-Bolyai” University, Cluj-Napoca, Romania. April, 2013 became associate professor within the Computer Science Department, UBB, Cluj-Napoca, Romania. October, 2009 became lecturer within the Computer Science Department, UBB, Cluj-Napoca, Romania. October, 2008 graduated the Ph.D. research and became doctor at INSA, Rouen, France. June, 2004 graduated Computer Science at UBB, Cluj-Napoca, Romania. Recent publications – Google scholar Recent publications Manole, A., Dioşan, L., UOLO: A Multitask U-Net YOLO Hybrid Model for Railway Scene Understanding, IEEE Transactions on Intelligent Vehicles, 2024, doi: 10.1109/TIV.2024.3442074 Munteanu, B., Murariu, A., Nichiteana, M., Pitaca, L., Dioşan, L., Value of original and generated ultrasound data towards training robust classifiers for breast cancer identification, Information Systems Frontiers, 2024 Mărginean, A., Mureșan, S., Hedeșiu, M., Dioșan, L., Teeth Segmentation and Carious Lesions Segmentation in Panoramic X-Ray Images using CariSeg, a Networks’ Ensemble , Heliyon, 2024 Current teaching 2nd semester Timetable Artificial Intelligence (Computer Science, Bachelor) link Intelligent Modeling  (Data Science, Master) link OOP (Computer Science, Bachelor) link Contact – more Department of Computer Science, Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science, Babes-Bolyai University, Cluj-Napoca, Romania laura.diosan at ubbcluj.ro (the old email – lauras at cs.ubbcluj.ro – is still available, but I prefer to use the new one)
